title: Are there private schools with an outstanding science education program? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you mean private high schools, or private colleges? Many private high schools have excellent science education programs. But so do many excellent public schools. One of the very best is the Bronx High School of Science, which is an elite public school in New York, requiring an entrance exam. But it is free to New York residents if they can gain admission.

Here are a couple of lists. This lists public, private and online. There’s a filter to the left. 2021 Best STEM High Schools in America This lists public, charter and private. It’s sortable. Best STEM Schools - Top 500 {Newsweek] partnered with STEM.org - Educational Research & Credentialing Est. 2001 to rank America's Best STEM High Schools. We found schools in every region of the country that offer skilled teachers who keep up with developments in these fields and who create dynamic learning environments to engage their students.
